title: Ashtavakra Gita: The Ultimate Solace
description:
‘Ashtavakra Gita’, also known as ‘Song of Ashtavakra’, is a dialog between Sage Ashtavakra and King Janaka. It imparts highest form of spiritual wisdom without a compromise.In this modern day classic, Harsha has translated the verses of ’Ashtavakra Gita’ into English. Along with it, he has written an enlightening commentary on these verses.This highly acclaimed work deals with the core ideas of spirituality, such as:
Goal of Spirituality
Choice Vs. Destiny
Nature of Existence
Nature of Our Soul
Nature of Ignorance-The cause of suffering
Liberation by virtue of Self-Realization
Attainment of Self-Realization through Verbal means
Karmas and their types
This book paves the way for attainment of self-realization. It makes us aware of the fundamental unity that we have with the all-pervasive existence.
author: Harsha Yardi
